entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
